be.kuleuven.cs.oss.sonarfacade

Interface SonarFacade

  • All Superinterfaces:
    org.sonar.api.Extension, org.sonar.api.ServerComponent, org.sonar.api.ServerExtension
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    WebServiceSonarFacade

    public interface SonarFacade
extends org.sonar.api.ServerExtension
    Interface representing a facade for easy access to the Sonar database.
    Author:
    Pieter Agten

      • findResource

        Resource findResource(java.lang.String key)
        Find the resource with the given key.
        Parameters:
        key - The key of the resource to find.
        Returns:
        The resource with the given key, or null if no resource with that key exists.

      • findMetrics

        java.util.List<Metric> findMetrics()
        Find all metrics.
        Returns:
        A list of all metrics.

      • findProjects

        Find all projects.
        Returns:
        A list of all projects.

      • findMetric

        Metric findMetric(java.lang.String key)
        Find the metric with the given key.
        Parameters:
        key - The key of the metric to find.
        Returns:
        The metric with the given key, or null if no metric with that key exists.

      • findMeasure

        Measure findMeasure(Resource resource,
                    Metric metric)
        Find a measure for a given resource and metric. If multiple measures exist for the given resource and metric, an arbitrary measure is returned.
        Parameters:
        resource - The resource for which to find a measure.
        metric - The metric for which to find a measure.
        Returns:
        A measure for the given resource and metric, or null if no such measure exists.

      • findMeasures

        java.util.List<Measure> findMeasures(Resource resource)
        Find all measures for a given resource.
        Parameters:
        resource - The resource for which to find all measures.
        Returns:
        A list of all measures for the given resource.

      • findMeasures

        java.util.List<Measure> findMeasures(Resource resource,
                                     Metric... metrics)
        Find all measures for a given resource and a given list of metrics.
        Parameters:
        resource - The resource for which to find measures.
        metrics - The list of metric for which to find measures.
        Returns:
        A list of all measures for the given resource and list of metrics.

      • findClasses

        java.util.List<Resource> findClasses(Resource ancestor)
        Find all classes that are hierarchically below a given ancestor resource.
        Parameters:
        ancestor - The resource for which to return all classes that are hierarchically lower.
        Returns:
        A list of all classes that are hierarchically below the given ancestor resource.
